downloadPageOpened: Download page has been opened, please follow the instructions to complete the update
updateDescription: A new version of InfloWave is available. We recommend upgrading to get the latest features and security updates.
oneClickInstallDesc: Supports one-click download and installation, no manual operation required.
manualDownloadDesc: We have prepared the installation package for your platform. Click "Update Now" to start downloading.
downloadCompletedReadyToInstall: Update package downloaded, ready to install
appWillCloseForInstall: Application will close and start installing update
